Articles.Content:
I tried to install the B9 aerospace mod, but it crashes every time I use it. Does anyone know how to install it?

This is what I did:

The image did not show up. what I did was to move everything in the game data folder from B9 aerospace into the gam data folder in KSP.

BTW I use a mac.

Welcome to the forums!

I'm guessing you have an edit pending approval.

To install B9, you should follow the instructions included in the How to Get Support sticky. Many mods instruct you to merge folders, which works differently on Macs than Windows. The major difference is that Mac OS X will only offer to merge when copying a folder. In general, you should merge the GameData folder by hand Ã¢â‚¬â€œ explore the unzipped folders until you find the appropriate folder to put in GameData, as detailed by the Support sticky.

Make sure you read the B9 OP, too. There's an important note in there about Active Texture Management.
